name: Johanna L. Jones
title: Chief Operating Officer
bio: Johanna L. Jones serves as the Chief Operating Officer of Cornerstone Deliverance & Development Ministries, bringing exceptional leadership and operational expertise to the organization.

With a deep commitment to community development and empowerment, Johanna plays a pivotal role in overseeing the day-to-day operations and ensuring that all programs and services align with the organization's mission and values.

Her strategic vision and dedication to excellence have been instrumental in expanding Cornerstone's reach and impact throughout the community. Johanna's approach combines practical business acumen with a genuine passion for serving others.

Through her leadership, Johanna has helped establish efficient systems and processes that enable the organization to better serve families, youth, and communities. Her commitment to operational excellence ensures that Cornerstone can maximize its resources to create lasting positive change.

Johanna's collaborative spirit and ability to build strong relationships with staff, partners, and community members make her an invaluable asset to the Cornerstone team. She continues to drive innovation and growth while staying true to the organization's core values of service, education, and community empowerment.
